definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Firstly, poetry is the product of combining poetry and music from the origin.
sentences.chinese: 第一，詩歌從本源上講是詩樂結合的產物。

sentences.english: Many souls have had no contact with their source for eons of time.
sentences.chinese: 許多靈魂和他們的本源已經千載萬世地失去了聯繫。

sentences.english: They arehearersof their Origin, but not servants of machination.
sentences.chinese: 人是自身本源的傾聽者，然而並非是詭計者的僕人。

sentences.english: You point to the light and mouth to me, Origin of the world.
sentences.chinese: 你指着那燈，用嘴型告訴我，“它是，世界的本源。”

sentences.english: Positive psychology essentially focuses on the health model, Salutogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 積極心理學本質上就是健康模型，健康本源學。

sentences.english: Grain is the origin of the people's livelihood, the price of grain is a price foundation and food policy for the country.
sentences.chinese: 糧食是民生本源，糧價乃百價之基，糧政爲治國要舉。

sentences.english: You will generally feel better once you start getting more source energy.
sentences.chinese: 在你得到更多的本源能量的時候你會感覺更好。

sentences.english: It wanes because you forget about death.
sentences.chinese: 本源衰退是因你忘了死亡。

sentences.english: It gives you better health and removes traces of diseases.
sentences.chinese: 本源能量會讓你更健康並且遠離疾病。

sentences.english: But never can this be conveyed by science, however advanced it goes.
sentences.chinese: 無論科學如何進步，科學力所不能及人類生命之本源。

sentences.english: For Riza, returning to the One Source was a homecoming indeed as she had been separated for so long.
sentences.chinese: 對於雷薩，回到離開如此之久的全一本源的確是回家。

sentences.english: The world of the imagination is indeed your contact with your own source. - Seth Mass Events.
sentences.chinese: 想象的世界實際上是你們與你們自身本源的連結處。

sentences.english: You would never allow it to do so if it were certain that you were to die tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 即使你已確知明天將死，也不要讓本源衰萎。

sentences.english: Programs written in Ruby should spring from that same God-given source.
sentences.chinese: 用Ruby寫的程序應該源於同一天賜本源。

sentences.english: The souls of emperors and cobblers are cast in the same mould.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝和普通工匠的靈魂來自同一本源。

sentences.english: The gods are going to be limited. They are not the source of all.
sentences.chinese: 神的能力就會被縮小，他們就不再是萬物的本源。

definition: main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
primal chaos/formless mass before creation in Chinese mythology/muddled/innocent as a baby
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
